openscap.profile_description: This profile defines a baseline that aligns to the "Level 2 - Workstation" configuration from the Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 Benchmark™, v2.0.0, released 2024-06-20.  This profile includes Center for Internet Security® Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 CIS Benchmarks™ content.
openscap.profile_name: CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 Benchmark for Level 2 - Workstation
